SCRIPT.MSCRI: : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Server IP or DNS" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_VMM_SERVER_IP#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Port" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_VMM_PORT#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Username" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_VMM_USERNAME#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM

DOCU_Docu.DOC: It logs the common input parameters like VMM server or IP, Port and Username
